heading: Story Runner
text: This modal can be reached by clicking "Run Story" inside the Story screen (Single Story Runner) or by clicking "Run Stories" located in the top menu (Multiple Stories Runner).

heading: Story Runner Parameters
text: Fields in this modal should be used to set parameters needed for the execution of stories.

heading: Story Runner Parameters
text: For example, browser type can be specified with this drop-down list.

heading: Story Runner Parameters
text: When this button is clicked, all selected stories will be run. The result depends on the context this modal came from. When executed from a single story, result would look like this example. If, on the other hand, it was executed from "Run Stories" top menu item, result is similar to this example.
